text: Hossain Toufique Imam (; 15 January 1939 â€“ 4 March 2021) was a Bangladesh Awami League politician. He was a political advisor to the Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina. Imam died of kidney disease at a Dhaka hospital on 4 March 2021, aged 82. ==References== Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney disease
